## VersionedItem type

Abstract base class for Versioned Items. Instances of this class represent a specific version of a Versioned Item. This version is either explicitly stated in the TCM URI (e.g. tcm:1-2-v3) or is implicitly the latest version.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type VersionedItem = RepositoryLocalObject & {
    DynamicVersionInfo?: DynamicVersionInfo;
    VersionInfo?: FullVersionInfo;
};
```

**References:** [RepositoryLocalObject](./open-api-client.repositorylocalobject.md)<!-- -->, [DynamicVersionInfo](./open-api-client.dynamicversioninfo.md)<!-- -->, [FullVersionInfo](./open-api-client.fullversioninfo.md)
